title: Computers: the friendly invasion
creator_credit: Michael Bonifer, S R S and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: Computer graphics and spectacular scenes from the Disney film “Tron” illustrate some computer applications in an entertaining film that introduces students to a future resource.
